name: mthmsta
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqsstri(c0, c1, cima(ccnv(cfv(cmsr, c2)), cima(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmpps, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cima(ccnv(cfv(cmsr, c2)), cima(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmpps, c2))))
-| wss(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmsr, c2)), cima(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmpps, c2))), c1)
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 =(`'(mStRed ` c2)"((mStRed ` c2)"(mPPSt ` c2)))
⊣ (`'(mStRed ` c2)"((mStRed ` c2)"(mPPSt ` c2)))⊆ c1

stmt.pretty: sseqtri((`'(mStRed ` c2)"((mStRed ` c2)"(mPPSt ` c2))), c1, dom((mStRed ` c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmsr, c2)), cima(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmpps, c2))), c1)

⊣ dom((mStRed ` c2))= c1
